content: Hi, I'm a 70 y/o psychologist in CA.  I've canvassed locally many times...but don't we need people to reach out to voters (especially older voters) Face-to-Face in battle ground states?  I would be willing to travel to do so.  Are there volunteer groups for this purpose?  Thanks
try searching events.democrats.org for opportunities. Also look at the Democratic parties for battleground states and our <#1268426751164551199> thread here on the server. Hope that helped, Dr. B!

Hi Dr. B. I found https://www.mobilize.us/ to be very helpful in finding ways to help in key states. You can filter by state, city, etc. I live in New York City but found ways to help in Pennsylvania.
